meanings.definition: A large group or collection of people or things.
meanings.sent1: At the park, there were bevies of children playing together.
meanings.sent2: During the parade, there were bevies of colorful floats passing by.
meanings.sent3: The bevies of toys in the store seemed to come alive at night.
meanings.sent4: The library shelves held bevies of books waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with bevies of flowers in full bloom.

meanings.definition: A group of birds or animals, especially when in flight.
meanings.sent1: In the sky, bevies of geese flew in perfect formation.
meanings.sent2: The nature documentary captured bevies of migrating birds in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The bevies of pigeons in the park put on an impressive aerial show.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, bevies of bats emerged from the caves like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The bevies of seagulls circled above the fishing boats, hoping for scraps.
